title: Person of interest (Flesh and blood) Reese to the rescue (Eng subs)
author: Manos Nomidis
comment: You cut off the best part! Carter's kid saying "he's kind of badass"...
This show had some really good uses of music. My favorites are when they're in the substation, and when Elias first reveals himself.

Aw, good ol season one! Back when the show was a quality action\adventure procedural about these broken characters trying to help save people. I will always treasure the magic of the first two seasons
I love this sequence, this music makes even better.
Reese is god damn cool! Tough guy, huh?
description:
A badass screentime of John , from Season 1 Episode 19 , where he busts in a building  to save Taylor  and Don Moretti. 

Song played in the video : 'Burn my shadow' by Unkle 

I do  not own any of this video content. All rights belong to Warner Bros/ CBS !
